name: screens/vlcsnap-2022-12-17-17h47m32s378.png
caption: when Gorbachev came to power he immediately got reports from across the Soviet Union

name: screens/vlcsnap-2022-12-17-17h47m34s842.png

name: screens/vlcsnap-2022-12-17-17h47m42s972.png

name: screens/vlcsnap-2022-12-17-17h47m49s468.png

name: screens/vlcsnap-2022-12-17-17h47m51s880.png

name: screens/vlcsnap-2022-12-17-17h47m54s834.png

name: screens/vlcsnap-2022-12-17-17h47m57s443.png

name: screens/vlcsnap-2022-12-17-17h47m59s062.png

caption: diamond mine Lensk Siberia

name: screens/vlcsnap-2022-12-17-17h48m45s291.png

caption: villager being forcibly taken to mental hospital

name: screens/vlcsnap-2022-12-17-17h49m04s181.png

name: screens/vlcsnap-2022-12-17-17h49m06s503.png

name: screens/vlcsnap-2022-12-17-17h49m21s799.png
caption: the Togliatti car plant

name: screens/vlcsnap-2022-12-17-17h49m28s198.png
caption: Togliatti was one of the largest car plants in the world

name: screens/vlcsnap-2022-12-17-17h49m31s555.png
caption: in 1986 Gorbachev went to Togliatti and announced a radical reform of communism

name: screens/vlcsnap-2022-12-17-17h49m34s361.png
caption: he called it perestroika

name: screens/vlcsnap-2022-12-17-17h49m36s233.png
caption: he would give new power to the managers of the giant industries

name: screens/vlcsnap-2022-12-17-17h49m38s796.png
caption: the future of communism was now in their hands

name: screens/vlcsnap-2022-12-17-17h49m40s361.png
caption: no longer controlled by Moscow

name: screens/vlcsnap-2022-12-17-17h49m56s431.png
caption: the Mir space station was being built

name: screens/vlcsnap-2022-12-17-17h50m00s399.png
caption: it was to be the first stage of the Soviet exploration of the whole solar system

name: screens/vlcsnap-2022-12-17-17h50m07s885.png
caption: a giant nuclear rocket would come from Earth and join with it

name: screens/vlcsnap-2022-12-17-17h50m17s937.png
caption: and set off across the universe

name: screens/vlcsnap-2022-12-17-17h50m30s719.png
caption: the creche at Togliatti car plant

name: screens/vlcsnap-2022-12-17-17h50m34s217.png
caption: the managers at the plant didn't believe they could reform the factory

name: screens/vlcsnap-2022-12-17-17h50m36s972.png
caption: instead they began to use their new power to loot the plant

name: screens/vlcsnap-2022-12-17-17h50m39s404.png
caption: hundreds of cars were taken off the production line and given to criminals waiting outside

name: screens/vlcsnap-2022-12-17-17h50m42s370.png
caption: the managers and the gangsters split the profits

name: screens/vlcsnap-2022-12-17-17h50m44s458.png
caption: a new alliance between crime and communism began to rise up

name: screens/vlcsnap-2022-12-17-17h51m09s535.png
caption: Afghanistan 1986

name: screens/vlcsnap-2022-12-17-17h51m14s120.png
caption: six years before Russian had invaded Afghanistan to save the communist regime

name: screens/vlcsnap-2022-12-17-17h51m16s726.png
caption: it had turned into a horrific wat against the Mujahedin guerillas

name: screens/vlcsnap-2022-12-17-17h51m19s231.png
caption: Russian helicopters were being shot down by stinger missiles

name: screens/vlcsnap-2022-12-17-17h51m21s714.png

name: screens/vlcsnap-2022-12-17-17h51m29s113.png

name: screens/vlcsnap-2022-12-17-17h51m32s012.png
caption: Leningrad cake factory

name: screens/vlcsnap-2022-12-17-17h51m53s829.png

name: screens/vlcsnap-2022-12-17-17h51m56s418.png
caption: vast amounts of radiation spread across Ukraine and Russia

name: screens/vlcsnap-2022-12-17-17h51m59s489.png
caption: Soviet propaganda class Kabul

name: screens/vlcsnap-2022-12-17-17h52m06s714.png
caption: war dead cemetery Kabul

caption: Losino-Petrovsky state chick farm outside Moscow

name: screens/vlcsnap-2022-12-17-17h52m18s584.png
caption: the Caucasus mountains on the border between Georgia and Russia

name: screens/vlcsnap-2022-12-17-17h52m20s287.png
caption: 1900km from Moscow

name: screens/vlcsnap-2022-12-17-17h52m26s841.png
caption: the epidemic department Moscow region testing reservoir water

name: screens/vlcsnap-2022-12-17-17h53m01s829.png
caption: by 1987 it was clear Perestroika wasn't working

name: screens/vlcsnap-2022-12-17-17h53m04s958.png
caption: so much was being stolen from the factories that there were shortages in all the state shops

name: screens/vlcsnap-2022-12-17-17h53m08s079.png
caption: Gorbachev decided to introduce a limited kind of capitalism into the communist system

name: screens/vlcsnap-2022-12-17-17h53m10s022.png
caption: people could set up their own co-operatives

name: screens/vlcsnap-2022-12-17-17h53m12s732.png
caption: for the first time they could make and sell things for profit

name: screens/vlcsnap-2022-12-17-17h53m15s511.png
caption: it was the only way he said to save communism

name: screens/vlcsnap-2022-12-17-17h53m17s644.png
caption: 6 months later

name: screens/vlcsnap-2022-12-17-17h53m21s091.png
caption: a new co-operative market in Leningrad

name: screens/vlcsnap-2022-12-17-17h53m36s219.png
caption: the graveyard of political prisoners in Vorkuta

name: screens/vlcsnap-2022-12-17-17h53m41s659.png
caption: reindeer herding in Vorkuta

name: screens/vlcsnap-2022-12-17-17h54m18s857.png
caption: tape wiped by the Soviet censor

name: screens/vlcsnap-2022-12-17-17h54m21s918.png
caption: Poland 1987 demonstration demanding democracy and independence

name: screens/vlcsnap-2022-12-17-17h54m28s135.png
caption: as part of Perestroika the top 5 generals in the KGB took part in a phone-in

name: screens/vlcsnap-2022-12-17-17h54m31s274.png
caption: the generals assured viewers that the KGB did not keep files on individuals

name: screens/vlcsnap-2022-12-17-17h54m33s975.png
caption: no one believed them

name: screens/vlcsnap-2022-12-17-17h54m37s056.png
caption: girl showing her "magic hands" Azerbaijan

name: screens/vlcsnap-2022-12-17-17h54m48s929.png
caption: under communism there had been no profit and loss

name: screens/vlcsnap-2022-12-17-17h54m51s209.png
caption: industries traded with each other using an artificial currency called "non-cash"

name: screens/vlcsnap-2022-12-17-17h54m54s149.png
caption: but the new co-operatives were allowed to convert non-cash into real money

name: screens/vlcsnap-2022-12-17-17h54m55s925.png
caption: a young communist called Mikhail Khodorkovsky saw the opportunity this offered

name: screens/vlcsnap-2022-12-17-17h54m58s962.png
caption: he set up co-operatives which begin to take non-cash out of the old industries

name: screens/vlcsnap-2022-12-17-17h55m02s139.png
caption: and turn it into real money

name: screens/vlcsnap-2022-12-17-17h55m04s571.png
caption: Khodorkovsky began to make millions out of nothing

name: screens/vlcsnap-2022-12-17-17h55m06s708.png
caption: he became the first of the oligarchs

name: screens/vlcsnap-2022-12-17-17h55m08s956.png
caption: discotheque Kosmos Hotel Moscow

name: screens/vlcsnap-2022-12-17-17h55m32s456.png
caption: the scientists finally found the core

name: screens/vlcsnap-2022-12-17-17h55m36s326.png
caption: an oil pipeline exploded in Siberia

name: screens/vlcsnap-2022-12-17-17h55m38s876.png
caption: it killed 575 people in a passing train

name: screens/vlcsnap-2022-12-17-17h55m44s544.png
caption: bathroom in the Kosmos Hotel Moscow

name: screens/vlcsnap-2022-12-17-17h55m53s338.png
caption: petrol queue Kyiv suburb

name: screens/vlcsnap-2022-12-17-17h56m06s038.png
caption: in 1988 the KGB buried one of their heroes

name: screens/vlcsnap-2022-12-17-17h56m08s600.png
caption: the British spy Kim Philby

name: screens/vlcsnap-2022-12-17-17h56m11s521.png
caption: at the same time the Soviet army began its retreat from Afghstanistan

name: screens/vlcsnap-2022-12-17-17h56m15s151.png
caption: it had been defeated by the Mjahedin

name: screens/vlcsnap-2022-12-17-17h56m18s373.png
caption: Rufina Pukhova Kim Philby's widow

name: screens/vlcsnap-2022-12-17-17h56m32s297.png
caption: the Togliatti plant was in chais

name: screens/vlcsnap-2022-12-17-17h56m36s017.png
caption: gangsters were killing each other on the factory floor to get hold of cars

name: screens/vlcsnap-2022-12-17-17h56m39s437.png
caption: Boris Berezovsky had been trained in economic planning

name: screens/vlcsnap-2022-12-17-17h56m41s561.png
caption: and game theory

name: screens/vlcsnap-2022-12-17-17h56m43s421.png
caption: he offered to help the managers restore order

name: screens/vlcsnap-2022-12-17-17h56m45s519.png
caption: the looting would be organised on rational scientific principles

name: screens/vlcsnap-2022-12-17-17h56m47s781.png
caption: each month Berezovsky took tens of thousands of cars

name: screens/vlcsnap-2022-12-17-17h56m50s041.png
caption: and set up a shadow-system to distribute them across Russia

name: screens/vlcsnap-2022-12-17-17h56m53s729.png

name: screens/vlcsnap-2022-12-17-17h57m11s508.png
caption: the Soviet Phobos 2 rocket had been sent to explore the moons of Mars

name: screens/vlcsnap-2022-12-17-17h57m14s774.png
caption: it enetered orbit around Mar in January 1989

name: screens/vlcsnap-2022-12-17-17h57m17s040.png
caption: Phobos moon

name: screens/vlcsnap-2022-12-17-17h57m19s148.png
caption: Tblisi capital of Georgia

name: screens/vlcsnap-2022-12-17-17h57m22s194.png
caption: Perestroika had also given power away to the countries that made up the Soviet empire

name: screens/vlcsnap-2022-12-17-17h57m25s079.png
caption: it opened the way for a return of old nationalisms and demands for independence

name: screens/vlcsnap-2022-12-17-17h57m27s738.png
caption: in April 1989 there was a nationalist demonstration in Tiblisi

name: screens/vlcsnap-2022-12-17-17h57m34s981.png
caption: Gorbachev panicked and ordered Russian troops to suppress it

name: screens/vlcsnap-2022-12-17-17h57m37s138.png
caption: the patriarch of Georgia came to warn the crowd

name: screens/vlcsnap-2022-12-17-17h57m59s190.png
caption: the Russian troops attacked the Georgian demonstration

name: screens/vlcsnap-2022-12-17-17h58m00s909.png
caption: beating and spraying gas into the mouths of protestors

name: screens/vlcsnap-2022-12-17-17h58m07s724.png
caption: the attack shocked the Soviet Union

name: screens/vlcsnap-2022-12-17-17h58m13s866.png
caption: Boris Yeltsin had once been Gorbachev's main ally

name: screens/vlcsnap-2022-12-17-17h58m16s824.png
caption: but now Yeltsin believed that perestroika had failed

name: screens/vlcsnap-2022-12-17-17h58m19s765.png
caption: there were less and less goods in the shops

name: screens/vlcsnap-2022-12-17-17h58m21s294.png
caption: in Poland and Germany the borders to the west were about to collapse

name: screens/vlcsnap-2022-12-17-17h58m24s429.png
caption: in Vorkuta the miners began a mass strike

name: screens/vlcsnap-2022-12-17-17h58m27s658.png
caption: nationalists had begin attacking Soviet troops in Armenia

name: screens/vlcsnap-2022-12-17-17h58m30s410.png
caption: Yeltsin believed the only way to save Russia was to end the communist system completely

name: screens/vlcsnap-2022-12-17-17h58m32s535.png
caption: and replace it with democracy and capitalism
